verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> Gog <S%H1463><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Magog, <S%H4031><s%> the prince <S%H5387><s%> of Rosh, <S%H7220><s%> Meshech, <S%H4902><s%> and Tubal, <S%H8422><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him,

and say, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> you, O Gog, <S%H1463><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of Rosh, <S%H7220><s%> Meshech, <S%H4902><s%> and Tubal. <S%H8422><s%>

"And I will turn <S%H7725><s%> you about, <S%H7725><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> hooks <S%H2397><s%> into your jaws, <S%H3895><s%> and I will bring <S%H3318><s%> you out, and all <S%H3605><s%> your army, <S%H2428><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%> and horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them splendidly <S%H4358><s%> attired, <S%H3847><s%> a great <S%H7227><s%> company <S%H6951><s%> [with] buckler <S%H6793><s%> and shield, <S%H4043><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them wielding <S%H8610><s%> swords; <S%H2719><s%>
Persia, <S%H6539><s%> Ethiopia, <S%H3568><s%> and Put <S%H6316><s%> with them, all <S%H3605><s%> of them [with] shield <S%H4043><s%> and helmet; <S%H3553><s%>

Gomer <S%H1586><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> its troops; <S%H102><s%> Beth-togarmah [from] the remote <S%H3411><s%> parts <S%H3411><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> its troops <S%H102><s%> â€“ many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> with you.

"Be prepared, <S%H3559><s%> and prepare <S%H3559><s%> yourself, you and all <S%H3605><s%> your companies <S%H6951><s%> that are assembled <S%H6950><s%> about <S%H5921><s%> you, and be a guard <S%H4929><s%> for them.

"After <S%H4480><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you will be summoned; <S%H6485><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> you will come <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> that is restored <S%H7725><s%> from the sword, <S%H2719><s%> [whose inhabitants] have been gathered <S%H6908><s%> from many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H5971><s%> to the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had been <S%H1961><s%> a continual <S%H8548><s%> waste; <S%H2723><s%> but its people were brought <S%H3318><s%> out from the nations, <S%H5971><s%> and they are living <S%H3427><s%> securely, <S%H983><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them.

"And you will go <S%H5927><s%> up, you will come <S%H935><s%> like a storm; <S%H9585><s%> you will be like a cloud <S%H6051><s%> covering <S%H3680><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> you and all <S%H3605><s%> your troops, <S%H102><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> with you."

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "It will come <S%H1961><s%> about on that day, <S%H3117><s%> that thoughts <S%H1697><s%> will come <S%H5927><s%> into your mind, <S%H3824><s%> and you will devise <S%H2803><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> plan, <S%H4284><s%>

and you will say, <S%H559><s%> 'I will go <S%H5927><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of unwalled <S%H6519><s%> villages. <S%H6519><s%> I will go <S%H935><s%> against those who are at rest, <S%H8252><s%> that live <S%H3427><s%> securely, <S%H983><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them living <S%H3427><s%> without <S%H369><s%> walls, <S%H2346><s%> and having <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> or gates, <S%H1817><s%>

to capture <S%H7997><s%> spoil <S%H7998><s%> and to seize <S%H962><s%> plunder, <S%H957><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the waste <S%H2723><s%> places <S%H2723><s%> which are [now] inhabited, <S%H3427><s%> and against <S%H413><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who are gathered <S%H622><s%> from the nations, <S%H1471><s%> who have acquired <S%H6213><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%> and goods, <S%H7075><s%> who live <S%H3427><s%> at the center <S%H2872><s%> of the world. <S%H776><s%>'

"Sheba, <S%H7614><s%> and Dedan, <S%H1719><s%> and the merchants <S%H5503><s%> of Tarshish, <S%H8659><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> its villages, <S%H9219><s%> will say <S%H559><s%> to you, 'Have you come <S%H935><s%> to capture <S%H7997><s%> spoil <S%H7998><s%>? Have you assembled <S%H6950><s%> your company <S%H6951><s%> to seize <S%H962><s%> plunder, <S%H957><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> away silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> away cattle <S%H4735><s%> and goods, <S%H7075><s%> to capture <S%H7997><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> spoil <S%H7998><s%>?'"'

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to Gog, <S%H1463><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "On that day <S%H3117><s%> when My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> are living <S%H3427><s%> securely, <S%H983><s%> will you not know <S%H3045><s%> [it]?

"And you will come <S%H935><s%> from your place <S%H4725><s%> out of the remote <S%H3411><s%> parts <S%H3411><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%> you and many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> with you, all <S%H3605><s%> of them riding <S%H7392><s%> on horses, <S%H5483><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> assembly <S%H6951><s%> and a mighty <S%H7227><s%> army; <S%H2428><s%>

and you will come <S%H5927><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> like a cloud <S%H6051><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%> It will come <S%H1961><s%> about in the last <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> that I shall bring <S%H935><s%> you against <S%H5921><s%> My land, <S%H776><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that the nations <S%H1471><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> Me when I shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> through you before their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> O Gog. <S%H1463><s%> "

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Are you the one <S%H1931><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> I spoke <S%H1696><s%> in former <S%H6931><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> My servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who prophesied <S%H5012><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> for [many] years <S%H8141><s%> that I would bring <S%H935><s%> you against <S%H5921><s%> them?

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about on that day, <S%H3117><s%> when <S%H3117><s%> Gog <S%H1463><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "that My fury <S%H2534><s%> will mount <S%H5927><s%> up in My anger. <S%H639><s%>

"And in My zeal <S%H7068><s%> and in My blazing <S%H784><s%> wrath <S%H5678><s%> I declare <S%H1696><s%> [that] on that day <S%H3117><s%> there will surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> be a great <S%H1419><s%> earthquake <S%H7494><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"And the fish <S%H1709><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the creeping <S%H7431><s%> things <S%H7431><s%> that creep <S%H7430><s%> on the earth, <S%H127><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H120><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> will shake <S%H7493><s%> at My presence; <S%H6440><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> also will be thrown <S%H2040><s%> down, <S%H2040><s%> the steep <S%H4095><s%> pathways <S%H4095><s%> will collapse, <S%H5307><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> wall <S%H2346><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>

"And I shall call <S%H7121><s%> for a sword <S%H2719><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him on all <S%H3605><s%> My mountains, <S%H2022><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%> "Every <S%H376><s%> man's sword <S%H2719><s%> will be against his brother. <S%H251><s%>

"And with pestilence <S%H1698><s%> and with blood <S%H1818><s%> I shall enter <S%H8199><s%> into judgment <S%H8199><s%> with him; and I shall rain <S%H4305><s%> on him, and on his troops, <S%H102><s%> and on the many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are with him, a torrential <S%H7857><s%> rain, <S%H1653><s%> with hailstones, <S%H417><s%> <S%H68><s%> fire, <S%H784><s%> and brimstone. <S%H1614><s%>

"And I shall magnify <S%H1431><s%> Myself, sanctify <S%H6942><s%> Myself, and make <S%H3045><s%> Myself known <S%H3045><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> nations; <S%H1471><s%> and they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"'
